name: buttercream.vim
description: A script which sports a pale yellow background and while it has lots of colors it is still very smooth and usable for long sessions. Screenshot available: http://hakan.prinsig.se/files/images/gvim-buttercream.png
install_details: Just copy it to your ~/.vim/colors directory on *NIX, on Windows copy it to the vimfiles/colors/ directory under the vim installation directory.

versions.release_notes: Paler colors - the background is now #FFFFDE.This looks more like I intended it to look like in the first place - thanks to my new flatscreen that displays colors correctly (unlike my old very pale CRT).
